articles.title: Greetings to Palestinian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Palestinian President
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greeting to Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine and chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization, on the occasion of the 28th anniversary of the proclamation of the State of Palestine.
					 The message sincerely wished the Palestinian president good health and success in carrying out the just cause of the Palestinian people to build an independent state with East Kuds as its capital city.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Libya Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Libya Appointed
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Ju Jin Hyok was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Libya, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Thanks to Service Personnel, Shock Brigade Members and People from C.C., WPK
articles.content:
Thanks to Service Personnel, Shock Brigade Members and People from C.C., WPK
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Sunday sent a message of thanks to the service personnel, shock brigade members and people across the country who performed a miracle of turning misfortune into blessings on the front of recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province.
					 According to the message of thanks, new streets and villages under socialism have successfully sprung up in the northern areas hit by an unprecedented natural disaster through the two months-long fierce all-people campaign conducted in response to the militant appeal made by the Party to achieve a miraculous victory of turning misfortune into blessings on the front of recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province by dint of the great single-minded unity.
					
					 The miraculous victory on the front of recovering from the flood damage in the northern part created new legendary stories about heroes of Juche Korea that has overcome the big disaster by dint of the single-minded unity of the Party, army and people.
					
					 All the service personnel and people going through fire and water in hearty response to the Party's call, unanimously supported the decision made by Party to set it as a major thrust of the 200-day campaign to recover from the flood damage in the northern part, turned out in an all-people general charge reminiscent of the great Chollima upswing in the post-war period and thus performed world-startling miracles in the drive for recovering from the flood damage through the army-people operations.
					
					 The eye-opening changes made in the areas along the River Tuman in the northern part of the country constitute a proud monument comprehensively reflecting the true nature and might of socialism where one is for all and all is for one.
					
					 During the days of creating unheard-of miracles in rehabilitation, the tremendous might of the country was bolstered up and the speed of the advancement of the Korean revolution remarkably increased and this dealt a sledge-hammer blow to the enemy touting "story about crisis" in the DPRK.
					
					 The signal victory in the drive for recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province strikingly demonstrated the faith in sure victory and revolutionary optimism of the members of the WPK and the heroic Korean people who get stronger in their courage and spirit in the face of manifold trials and difficulties and the victorious tradition of the Korean revolution effecting a great surge into a new stage by turning adversity into favorable situation and misfortune into blessings.
					
					 The Central Committee of the WPK once again extends warm thanks to all the people who are the invariable supporters, advisers and assistants of the Party, highly appreciating ardent patriotism and heroic feats performed by the service personnel and shock brigade members who demonstrated before the whole world the truth of the Juche idea and the great might of the single-minded unity and firmly preserved the dignity of the country and the Party's policy of prioritizing the popular masses by winning a great victory of turning misfortune into blessings in the campaign for conserving nature and in the fierce confrontation with the hostile forces.
					
					 The Central Committee of the WPK firmly believes that the service personnel of the Korean People's Army, shock brigade members and the people across the country who performed a miraculous victory of turning misfortune into blessings on the front of recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province will vigorously advance along the orbit set by the Party Central Committee, triumphantly conclude the historic 200-day campaign and make a fresh leaping forward and innovations in the general advance for implementing the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Dwelling Houses Completed in Flood-hit Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Dwelling Houses Completed in Flood-hit Northern Part of North Hamgyong Province
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- One-storied dwelling houses, three-storied and five-storied apartment houses for over 11,900 families, at least 3,000 units, were completed in more than one hundred areas including Hoeryong City, Musan, Yonsa, Onsong, Kyongwon and Kyonghung counties in North Hamgyong Province in a matter of  more than 50 days. They were hit by the severest flood in the history of meteorological observation after the country's liberation. 
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, taking to heart more than anyone else the disaster suffered by the people in the area along the River Tuman, designated the operations to recover from the flood damage in the above-said areas as the main thrust of the ongoing 200-day campaign and unfolded a bold operation to win the miraculous victory in the drive for turning misfortune into favorable conditions.
					
					 In hearty response to the appeal of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea which reflected his noble intention of believing in the people as in Heaven, all service personnel and people turned out as one in the campaign to turn the afflicted areas into fairyland in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 Service personnel and members of shock brigades who took part in the campaign in recovering from flood damage in Kyonghung County successfully completed dwelling houses at the end of October. Apartment houses for more than 11,900 families in all northern areas including Kyongwon County and Hoeryong Ciy were built as of Nov. 11.
					
					 Land leveling was pushed forward along with the construction of new houses, turning the above-said areas into fairly towns under socialism and fairy villages in the era of the Workers' Party.

articles.title: Delegation of Social Scientists Society of Korea Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Social Scientists Society of Korea Back Home
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Social Scientists Society of Korea headed by Vice-Chairman Ri Kil Song came back home Monday after visiting African countries.

articles.title: Syrian Embassy Officials Visit Mansudae Art Studio
articles.content:
Syrian Embassy Officials Visit Mansudae Art Studio
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Syrian Ambassador to the DPRK Tammam Sulaiman and his embassy officials visited the Mansudae Art Studio on Monday on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of the corrective movement in Syria.
					 They laid a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the studio and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the studio was built as the world-level art production base under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, they looked round various production rooms and the art exhibition hall.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Rakwon Oxygen Separator Factory
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Rakwon Oxygen Separator Factory
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Rakwon Oxygen Separator Factory of the Rakwon Machine Complex.
					 Looking round the oxygen separators manufactured by the officials and workers of the factory, the premier encouraged them to register more signal achievements.
					
					 A consultative meeting was held to take measures for producing more oxygen separators required by the healthcare field in a brief span of time.
					
					 Meanwhile, the premier learnt about the work at the Sericulture Institute of the Academy of Agricultural Science and stressed the need to hasten science study and took measures to provide necessary facilities and materials. 
					
					 Earlier, the premier went round the venue of the 27th National Exhibition of Consumer Goods and discussed the issues of improving the quality of goods and producing as many as possible the consumer goods favored by the people.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday. 
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Participants in Sixth Congress of DWUK Watch Documentary Film
articles.content:
Participants in Sixth Congress of DWUK Watch Documentary Film
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The participants in the Sixth Congress of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea (DWUK) watched documentary film "Ushering in Golden Age of Revolution" at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 The film deals with the revolutionary leadership history of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who inspired service personnel and people across the country to the drive for building a powerful socialist country and demonstrated the dignity of Juche Korea and its national power on the highest stage with his energetic leadership day and night.
					
					 Officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea watched the film together with the participants in the congress.

articles.title: Results of Autumn Land Management Campaign in DPRK
articles.content:
Results of Autumn Land Management Campaign in DPRK
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been made in the land management of the DPRK through an autumn campaign.
					 According to data available, tens of kilometers of roads were constructed, hundreds of kilometers of roads improved, tens of bridges built and hundreds of kilometers of embankments repaired throughout the country during the autumn period of the general mobilization for land administration.
					
					 In Yonsa County of flood-hit North Hamgyong Province, servicepersons finished the Yonsa Bridge project and the 1,500-meter-long embankment in a short span of time.
					
					South Hamgyong Province carried out the project for filling earth of 110,000 cubic meters and excavating bedrock and earth of 443,000 cubic meters to improve roads extending 80-odd kilometers in a little more than two months.

articles.title: Taesongsan Sports Team Proves Successful at People's Games
articles.content:
Taesongsan Sports Team Proves Successful at People's Games
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The Taesongsan Sports Team of the DPRK again held undisputed command in winter sports events of the recent 13th People's Games.
					 The team came first in men's and women's team ice hockey and short-track speed skating as well as in figure skating.
					
					 In particular, its three players set the national record in 2,400m group sliding of speed skating and one player bagged five gold medals in women's short-track speed skating event.
					
					 Experts and spectators were unanimous in stating that the Taesongsan Sports Team is the country's strongest one in winter sports events.
					
					 The team is now putting spur to the training with a high goal to win the titles in all winter sports events.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Can Never Escape Severe Punishment: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Can Never Escape Severe Punishment: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- At a time when the whole of south Korea is thrown into appalling confusion due to the "Park Geun Hye, Choe Sun Sil scandal," the U.S. and the Park regime are playing a poor trick to quell the opposition of the local people to the projected THAAD deployment.
					 Finding themselves in a pretty fix from all sides, the Park group are craftily working to blind the south Korean people and stop their ears and get THAAD deployed at any cost at the prodding of their U.S. master who blustered that it would "press ahead with THAAD deployment with strong will".
					
					 The group of traitors are orchestrating the farce even with discharged soldiers involved to show that THAAD does no harm to human bodies and environment. At the same time, they are staging such burlesque as granting special benefits to Kimchon City and Sonju County at huge financial expenses. 
					
					 This is an absolutely risky gambling for Park troubled with a serious political crisis and financial difficulties. It is little short of a third-rate farce to calm down the mounting anti-"government" sentiments of the local people and rally again the conservative supporters who turned their backs on her.
					
					 Park is now called "vegetable president" as she allowed the woman who is no more than a witch to monopolize "state affairs." It is a sheer caricature for Park to talk about what she called measures to help the local inhabitants. 
					
					 Even if the puppet regime offers "compensation running into astronomical figures" to the local people, it can never help the discharged soldiers to be dispatched to Kimchon City get rid of the enormous mental and physical harm and alleviate the pain and losses the inhabitants in Songju County have to suffer due to the loss of the position as "long-standing watermelon producer."
					
					 The co-representative of the Kimchon No-THAAD Measure Committee said the electronic waves produced by THAAD radar would penetrate into Kimchon, adding that "it would be Kimchon City which will be exposed to the first gunfire in the case of a war between China and the U.S. as reported by the Chinese People's Daily. 
					
					 If THAAD is deployed in Kimchon City, the political, economic and security consequences wouldn't be confined to the city but the south Koreans would face unimaginably serious disaster.
					
					 All south Koreans, to say nothing of the people in the said areas, are categorically rejecting the projected THAAD deployment, holding that "it should not be allowed to be deployed anywhere on the Korean peninsula". This is a just voice not to tolerate the traitorous actions of the Park regime.
					
					 The Park group of traitors will never escape the nation's stern judgment as they are playing with the lives of the south Koreans and keen to turn the peninsula into a theater of big powers' scramble for bringing it under their thumb, relying on outsiders, stuck in the bottomless quagmire.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group's Persistent Military Provocations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group's Persistent Military Provocations
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Shortly, ago, traitor Han Min Gu, puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, sent a "commanding message" to the officers and staff officers of units at all levels, while raising a hue and cry over "complicated and instable security situation".
					 He ordered his inferiors to focus all efforts on "performing their duties," asserting that the "threat of the north's nukes and missiles is becoming potential" and "the north is highly likely to commit strategic and operational provocations aimed to bring about a change in the phase." 
					
					 Traitor Ri Sun Jin, chairman of the puppet joint chiefs of staff, was busy inspecting units including the third field army command of the ground force and drill grounds for a war against the north, crying out for "strong and resolute counteraction" against  "possible provocation from the north." 
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet forces staged a two day-long missile alert drill in the East Sea of Korea together with their U.S. and Japanese masters. It was allegedly aimed to "track ballistic missiles and exchange information" to cope with the north's missile provocation. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary says that it is a chronic evil practice for the group of traitors to kick off confrontation hysteria while recklessly pulling up the compatriots in the north whenever they were facing an extreme ruling crisis.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Much upset by the people's fierce struggle against the regime, the puppet group is becoming ever more frantic in its saber-rattling against the north under the pretext of "security crisis," noisily trumpeting about "the north's provocations." 
					
					 When the crow flies, her tail follows.
					
					 No one can vouch that the puppet group's reckless war moves against the north will not push the extreme tension on the Korean peninsula to the outbreak of a war.
					
					 The Park group's persistent military provocations designed to prolong its remaining days would only precipitate its final doom.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Report about Third All-people Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Report about Third All-people Action
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean media on Nov. 12 reported that the large-scale third all-people action which was staged in different parts of south Korea turned into scenes showing huge crowds of people expressing anger at Park Geun Hye and her group and satirizing them.
					 Yonhap News said the above-said action presented a huge caricature ridiculing Park Geun Hye and Choe Sun Sil. It went on: 
					
					 The participants in the rally chanted the slogan "Park Geun Hye, step down," holding such slogan boards.
					
					 On Nov. 13, CBS said that more than one million people gathered at one place, an expression of their resentment at the scandal which destroyed the very foundation of the society, irrespective of ideology and political trend.
					
					 The south Korean Newsis on Nov. 12 said that students of more than 10 secondary schools took streets in Kwangju and issued a declaration on the situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Demand Park Geun Hye Resign
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Demand Park Geun Hye Resign
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- South Korean opposition parties on Nov. 13 strongly demanded Park Geun Hye make a final decision to step down, according to reports from Seoul.
					 The Minju Party of south Korea said that it confirmed the mind-set of the angry public through the candlelight rally on Nov. 12.
					
					 It urged Park to take hands off "state affairs" and face a thorough investigation under law as she has no option but to make a final decision to step down as "president".

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Police Suppress Participants in Third All-people Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Police Suppress Participants in Third All-people Action
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police mercilessly suppressed participants in the third all-people action urging Park Geun Hye to step down.
					On Nov. 12, the puppet authorities, taken aback by massive protest of people from all walks of life, deployed more than 25,000 police forces of 272 companies in various places of Seoul under the pretest of coping with the "emergency" from the morning, creating a terror-ridden atmosphere.
					
					 The police forcibly walked off over 20 demonstrators and took those who were involved in the rally out of their cars before confiscating them.
					
					 Despite the security authorities' crackdown, people from all walks of life carried on all-night struggle including sit-in strike in tents and meeting around Chongwadae till seven a.m. of Nov. 13.

articles.title: Increasing Disillusionment with Park Geun Hye among S. Korean Youth
articles.content:
Increasing Disillusionment with Park Geun Hye among S. Korean Youth
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper OhmyNews in an article on Nov. 12 said that grievance against Park Geun Hye among the young generation has reached its height over the monopolization of "state affairs".
					 According to the article, the support rate for Park has remained the lowest for a fortnight. 
					
					 According to the opinion poll conducted by a south Korean institution for opinion survey from Nov. 8 to 10, almost all respondents said no to Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: Jobless Rate Increases in S. Korea
articles.content:
Jobless Rate Increases in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- The steadily increasing jobless rate in south Korea is becoming a serious problem.
					 According to information released by the puppet Agency of Statistics on Nov. 9, the number of jobless people in October increased 10 percent as compared with that in the corresponding month of last year.
					
					 The south Korean Newsis said the jobless rate was an all-time high in 11 years which is attributable to the restructuring pushed forward by the "government".

articles.title: Russian Media Praises Kim Jong Un's Leadership
articles.content:
Russian Media Praises Kim Jong Un's Leadership
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A Russian online magazine carried an article titled "Kim Jong Un's era" on Nov. 2.
					 The article said that when Marshal Kim Jong Un appeared in the political stage, a Russian expert commentated that Kim Jong Un would steadfastly carry forward the cause of leader Kim Jong Il without an inch of deflection.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung had outstanding art of diplomacy and performed great exploits, the article said, and went on:
					
					 After his demise the DPRK had to  make the Arduous March, forced march, owing to the economic sanctions and blockade from outsiders aiming at "collapse of the social system" and consecutive years of natural disasters.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, successor to President Kim Il Sung, firmly defended Korean socialism despite hard conditions.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the DPRK.
					
					 The most important task for the DPRK today is to build an economic power.
					
					 Russian experts who visited the DPRK say that social stability is guaranteed in the country and substantial progress is being achieved in various fields.
					
					 They appreciate the rapid development of the national defence industry and scientific and technical field in the DPRK, in particular.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is carrying out the cause of building a space power true to the wishes of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK put several satellites into orbit and this year it succeeded in the ground jet test of a new type high-power engine of a carrier rocket for the geo-stationary satellite.
					
					 Under the outstanding leadership of HE Kim Jong Un the DPRK will emerge a powerful socialist country in the near future.

articles.title: Ugandan Figure Releases Travelogue on DPRK
articles.content:
Ugandan Figure Releases Travelogue on DPRK
Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Mayambala Lawrence, chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, recently released a travelogue on the DPRK. 
					 In the travelogue he wrote he was surprised to see the beautiful, clean and pulsating capital city of Pyongyang with modern facilities quite contrary to the false propaganda made by Western media.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Korean people are ardent patriots. They consider the interests of the state as the top priority of all activities. 
					
					 The Korean people are full of confidence in the future and hope. Their hospitality was excellent, indeed. Everybody greeted foreign guests with smile and respect. 
					
					 The Korean people have excellent culture. The theatres present fantastic scenery. There I enjoyed wonderful performances of educational significance depicting ardent patriotism. 
					
					 I don't understand those trying to bring pain to the Korean people.
					
					 My visit to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum helped me understand why the DPRK had access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 One should know the past if one wants to know the present. What happened in Korea in the past may reoccur. However, the Korean people are ready to stand up against any economic blockade.
					
					 The DPRK conducted nuclear warhead explosion test recently.
					
					 The Korean people are dynamically advancing, united close around the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion al presidente palestino
Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 14 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente del Estado de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, con motivo del 28o aniversario de la proclamacion de este Estado.
					En su misiva, el remitente deseo al destinatario buena salud y formulo votos por los exitos en el cumplimiento de la justa causa del pueblo palestino por la fundacion de un Estado independiente con Kuds oriental como capital.

articles.title: Designado nuevo embajador coreano en Libia
articles.content:
Designado nuevo embajador coreano en Libia
Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Segun decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ju Jin Hyok, fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en Libia.

articles.title: CC del PTC agradece a participantes en campana de reconstruccion de zonas danadas
articles.content:
CC del PTC agradece a participantes en campana de reconstruccion de zonas danadas
Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea envio el dia 13 un mensaje de agradecimiento a los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los miembros de las brigadas y el pueblo de todo el pais quienes crearon un nuevo milagro de convertir lo desfavorable en lo favorable en el campo de la reconstruccion de las zonas septentrionales de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, damnificadas por las inundaciones.
					Al cabo de la lucha enconada de 2 meses desplegada por todo el pueblo en acato al llamamiento combativo del Partido de lograr con el gran poderio de la unidad monolitica la victoria milagrosa en el frente de reconstruccion de las zonas danadas, se levantaron elegantemente nuevas avenidas y aldeas del socialismo en el territorio septentrional de la patria que habia sido arrasado por el fenomeno natural, subraya el mensaje y continua:
					
					El triunfo milagroso en la campana de rehabilitacion deviene el nuevo mito heroico de Corea del Juche, que supero la gran calamidad natural haciendo gala de la unidad monolitica entre el Partido, el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					En apoyo unanime a la decision del Partido de cambiar el rumbo de ataque principal de la campana de 200 dias hacia el frente norteno, todo el ejercito y el pueblo que se dedican todo lo suyo por la materializacion del llamamiento del partido se movilizaron a la ofensiva general pannacional que hace recordar el periodo de gran auge de Chollima del postguerra, y crearon milagros vertiginosos con el poderio de la operacion conjunta de los militares y habitantes.
					
					La renovacion increible creada en la ribera del rio Tuman del territorio septentrional de la patria es el monumento orgulloso que muestra el poderio y la naturaleza del socialismo: Uno para todos y todos para uno.
					
					En ese periodo que se crearon los milagros de reconstruccion nunca vistos en la historia, se ha centuplicado el poderio de nuestro Estado y se ha hecho mas rapida la velocidad de marcha de la Revolucion Coreana, lo cual sirve del castigo duro a las fuerzas hostiles que difundian el "rumor de crisis" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					La brillante victoria en la campana de reconstruccion demostro la firme conviccion y el optimismo revolucionario de los militantes del PTC y el heroico pueblo coreano, que recobran mas animo ante las multiples dificultades, y la tradicion de victoria de la Revolucion Coreana que avanza a mas alta etapa convirtiendo lo desfavorable en lo favorable.
					
					El CC del PTC aprecia mucho la ardiente fidelidad patriotica y los meritos heroicos de los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y los brigadistas quienes manifestaron a todo el mundo la veracidad de la idea Juche y el poderio gigantesco de la unidad monolitica y defendieron firmemente la dignidad de la patria y la politica del PTC de dar primacia a las masas populares, al lograr la gran victoria en la guerra con la naturaleza y en la confrontacion enconada con las fuerzas hostiles, y vuelve a enviar el agradecimiento cordial a todo el pueblo, partidario, consejero y ayudante invariables de nuestro Partido.
					
					El CC del PTC esta muy seguro de que los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los brigadistas y el pueblo de todo el pais, movilizados en el frente de reconstruccion, concluiran con exito la historica campana de 200 dias, avanzando a todo galope por la ruta indicada por el CC del PTC, y crearan el nuevo salto e innovaciones en la marcha general para materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del PTC.

articles.title: Levantadas nuevas viviendas en zonas septentrionales damnificadas
articles.content:
Levantadas nuevas viviendas en zonas septentrionales damnificadas
Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Quedaron construidas nuevamente durante 50 dias y pico mas de 3 mil viviendas de 5 y 3 pisos y una sola planta para mas de 11 mil 900 familias en la ciudad de Hoeryong y los distritos de Musan, Yonsa, Onsong, Kyongwon y Kyonghung, de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, que han sufrido grandes perdidas por las lluvias torrenciales mas fuertes en la historia de observacion meteorologica despues de la liberacion del pais.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quien se puso mas adolorido que nadie por ese desastre ocurrido en las zonas riberenas del rio Tuman, hizo reorientar el rumbo principal de la campana de 200 dias a la lucha por la reconstruccion e ideo una ambiciosa operacion para registrar victoria milagrosa de convertir lo desfavorable en lo favorable.
					
					Respondiendo al llamamiento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, signado del noble ideario Iminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo) del Mariscal, todos los uniformados y civiles coreanos se movilizaron como un solo hombre en la campana para convertir las zonas danadas en un paraiso de la epoca del PTC.
					
					Los uniformados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los miembros de las brigadas de construccion, enviados al distrito de Kyonghung, fueron los primeros en terminar a fines de octubre la construccion de viviendas. Y hasta el dia 11 del mes en curso, concluyo la edificacion de viviendas para mas de 11 mil 900 familias en el distrito de Kyongwon, la ciudad de Hoeryong y otras partes. 
					
					Simultaneamente, se llevo adelante el ordenamiento de periferias, de manera que surgieran nuevas avenidas y aldeas de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo en las zonas siniestradas.

articles.title: Premier coreano recorre la Fabrica de Separador de Oxigeno de Rakwon
articles.content:
Premier coreano recorre la Fabrica de Separador de Oxigeno de Rakwon
Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju recorrio la Fabrica de Separador de Oxigeno de Rakwon adscrita al Complejo de Maquinaria de Rakwon.
					Examinando los separadores de oxigeno fabricados por los funcionarios y obreros de la planta, reconocio los exitos de trabajo de ellos.
					
					En la reunion consultiva fueron asignadas las tareas para producir en un corto plazo los mismos equipos necesarios a la rama de salud publica. 
					
					Por otra parte, durante su visita al Instituto de Sericultura de la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas, el premier enfatizo la importancia de dinamizar la investigacion cientifica y tomo las medidas para proveer de equipos y materias necesarios. 
					
					Con anterioridad, Pak recorrio la sede de la 27a exhibicion nacional de articulos de consumo popular e instruyo mejorar la calidad de los articulos y producir mucho mas mercancias de aceptacion popular.

articles.title: Park Geun-hye no podra evitar castigo severo; comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Park Geun-hye no podra evitar castigo severo; comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Cuando todo el suelo surcoreano es sacudido por el "escandalo de Park Geun-hye y Choe Sun Sil", EE.UU. y la banda de Park tratan de calmar la resistencia de los habitantes de la localidad escogida para el despliegue de THAAD.
					Sumandose a su amo gringo que le instiga diciendo que "acelerara con voluntad firme el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea", la camarilla de Park intenta llevarlo a cabo enganando a la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Moviliza hasta a los soldados licenciados para hacer propaganda de que THAAD no afecta al cuerpo humano y al medioambiente y concede prerrogativas de grandes sumas a la ciudad de Kimchon y el distrito de Songju donde sera ubicado el sistema antimisiles.
					
					Esta apuesta demasiada para Park Geun-hye, quien sufre gran crisis politica y financiera, persigue calmar el ambiente anti-"gubernamental" de los habitantes locales y agrupar de nuevo a los conservadores que ya le habian dado la espalda.
					
					Es muy ridiculo que la "presidenta vegetativa", que desbarato la administracion estatal siguiendo consejos de su mentora bruja, hablara de las supuestas "medidas" para los moradores locales.
					
					Aunque la camarilla de Park pague sumas astronomicas por concepto de "recompensa", nunca podra eliminar las enormes perdidas espirituales y humanas para los soldados licenciados que se ubicaran en la ciudad de Kimchon ni liquidar la angustia de los pobladores del distrito de Songju que perderan la "tradicional zona de cultivo de melones".
					
					El co-representante del comite de medidas contra el emplazamiento de THAAD en Kimchon dijo que las ondas electromagneticas emitidas por el radar de THAAD pasaran por toda la ciudad de Kimchon y esta sera primer blanco de fuego artillero en el tiempo de la guerra entre China y EE.UU. como ha reportado el diario chino Renmin Ribao.
					
					Si el equipo belico se emplaza en Kimchon, los danos politicos, economicos y de seguridad no se limitaran a esta ciudad y todo el pueblo surcoreano sufrira un desastre de inimaginable magnitud.
					
					Por eso, no solo los moradores de Kimchon y Songju sino toda la poblacion surcoreana rechazan totalmente el emplazamiento de THAAD en cualquier parte de la Peninsula Coreana, lo cual es resistencia muy justa para no perdonar nunca las acciones antinacionales de la banda de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Sera condenada al castigo severo de la nacion la camarilla traidora de Park que intenta convertir la Peninsula Coreana en campo de pugna de las potencias adulando a las fuerzas extranjeras y poniendo en peligro la vida del pueblo surcoreano.
